yuddhaya dinewwe sarath ponseka ho mahindarajapaksha ho wenath thani puthgalayeku nowe.mulu mahath sama siyalu denama ee sandaha dayaka wi atha.bilindu daruwa bona kiri koppaye sita apa kana bath atayak,parippu atayak gane badu gewamin yuddhaya kirimata mulyamaya lesa dayaka wimu.kapa kirim kalemu.sama sebalekuma thama uparimaya dakwa kapa halaha.ath pa ahimi karagath ha.jiwitha nathikaragathha.ponseka mahathata ee siyalla amathaka wi atha.nathinam amathaka karawa atha.thama panatath wada parissam karagatha yuthu yudha rahas me wana wita bala thanhawa nisa ekin eka wamaramin siti.mowun jathyantharaya idiriye niruwath kirimata sarasenne lanka mathawayi.

kiyana mathdrawya sanwidhanayata erehiwa mathdrawya watalimak karanawa, habayi methanadi aramuna wenne me sanwidhanaye thiyena kalu salli winasha karana eka, habayi meyalage ihala ayath danuwathwa jon ge kandayama ee kalu salli walin kotasak horakam karana upayak yodanawa, ithin kohomahari watalimata passe meyala ee kalu salli walin dolar miliyana 10 horakam karanna samath wenawa, meyala ee horakam karapu salli kabayaka gata gahala batayakin pahalata danawa, ithin meheyuma iwara wela aapahu awth balanakota, kambaaya kapagena gihin, dolar miliyana 10ma athurudan wenawa, eeka gaththe kawuda kiyalath danne na, ithin meyalage ihala niladharin hithanne me salli meyala horakam kala kiyala, eewagema masa hayakata meyalage wadath athhituwala wimarshanaya kalath salli gana kisima hoduwawak labenne na, masa hayakata passe aapahu kandayamata rajakari karanna awasthawa labenawa, habayi ethanadi me niyojithayangen ekkena gane darunu widiyata marenna gannawa, ithin ochchara thamayi mama kathawa gana kiyanne, dolar miliyana 10 horakam kale kawuda, ee salli aragena thiyenne mokatada, jonta monawa wewida, niyojithawaru marenna hethuwa mokadda, aththatama salli horakam karala thiyenne me kandayamada, kandayame ki denek berenawada wage kuthuhalaya pirunu prashna walata uththara me film eka baluwata passe hoyaganna puluwan weyi, ehenam mama gihin ennam, thawath upasirasiyakin hamuwena thek obata jaya!

sarana mangalyayapansala raka ganimu!madum piliwetha'aaloko udapadi' maha kapruk pujawa saha ashtaparishkara pujawachaithya wandanawadoragamuwa shri shaila pabbatharama raja maha wiharayanawa arahadi budu guna bhawanawaigenuma yanu jiwithaya gana hadarima yiseth pirith deshanawe apirimitha bala mahimayakawi sankalpanawamulu lowama kada watunath gunabara mawupiyan oba samagayirata rakinna anushasana kalath kata rakaganna asamath wu bamunapaw sedimanamo buddhayakuswala shri pushparama daham pasalasapa labana manga purudu karamurohiniyata same rogayak hadimata hethu wu pawabo thuru sewane kirana dahare shanthiya ...ajan brahmawanso maha therun wahansesorekuta pem kala shyama ganikaawasi de denna...siyalla siduwanne karmayenda?buddhanussathi bhawanawalowada sangarawasath hawiridi wiye di ma rahathbhawayata path ‘suba’ samanerayange athitha kathawakutumbhaya siyumali da?bhikshu samaja prathisanskaranayehila gathayuthu mangamathale halangoda rajamaha kohon wiharayamawupiya – du daruwopawul jiwithaya sampurna wanne daruwan da eyata athulath wunu witaya.

woltar dayarathna anuradhapura disa wisheshauthuru mada wathman pradhana amathya, ewakata samajasewa amathyawaraya lesa katayuthu kala barti premalal disanayaka mahathage nopasubata uthsahayaka sarthaka prathipalayak lesa ekdahas nawasiya anuhathe (1997) aarambha karana lada anuradhapura shri dalada perahara pahalos wana (15) wathawatath mema juli masa 24 – 25 yana dedina thula athyalankarayen, anurapura pinbime di pawathwe.eda anuradhapura rajadhaniyehi mahasen rajuge puth kithsiri mewan rajadawasa dambaadiwa kalingu rata rajakala guhasiwa rajuge diyaniya wu hemamala kumariya ha dantha kumaru dambaakola patunen basa shri dalada wahanse lakdiwata wadama kalaha.pasuwa dewanampiyathissa raju wisin idikarana lada dhammachakka maligayehi wada hinduwa, puda puja pawathwa aakarshaniya peraharak pawath wu bawa ape perahara ithihasaya sandahan karayi.shri dalada wahanse kithsirimewan raja dawasa meratata wadama kala kalhi ethuma wisin dalada wahanse athulu nuwarata wada hinduwa ehi bharakarathwaya, abhayagiri wiharaye uththara mulayata bharadi warshikawa perahara pawath wu bawa mahawanshayenda pennum karayi.esema me bawa maha wanshayen pamanak nowa pinakalamali pujawaliya yana granthawalin da pennum kara di atha.kithsiri mewan raja dawasin pasuwa shri dalada perahara wanshakathawe nawa pituwak sarasamin anuradhapura aithihasika shri dalada perahara ekdinakata sima wi, prathama perahara anuradhapura shuddha nagaraya kendra karagena pawathwuye 1997 juli masa 18 weni dinadiya.ema perahara aarambha kala 1997 perahara kamituwe anushasaka lesata hitapu atamasthanadhipathi apawath wi wadala pallegama sirisumana rewatha nyanarathana nahimiyan hitapu disapathi jayampathi pi.hetti aarachchi, madhyama sanskruthika aramudale adhyakshaka aacharya roland silwa sanwidhayaka kamituwe prathama lekam, wathman pradhana amathya sambandhikarana lekam premasiri hettiaarachchi yana mahathwaru mehila sihipath kirima kruthawedi bawa pawasami.mewara perahara kamituwe madhya sambandhikarana katayuthu pradhana amathyansha madhya lekam indika rangajiwa mahatha meheyawana athara ema katayuththa kala diwangatha sarath bandara hitapu pradhana amathyansha madhya lekamwaraya mehila sihipath karami.pauranika sampradayanta anuwa saha sanskruthika lakshanayanta anuwa hakitharam perahare siyalu anga pawathwima mewara suwishesha lakshanayaki.
